name: Wislon Learning
description: At Wilson Learning, our commitment is helping people and organizations. We assist executive sales and leadership teams with employee engagement, salesforce development, leadership development, strategy alignment, business transformation, and workforce upskilling. This requires a disciplined and dynamic approach in assessing, developing, delivering, reinforcing, and sustaining learning solutions. Our passion for helping people and organizations achieve Performance with Fulfillment began over 50 years ago and continues with fervor today. Only through both Performance with Fulfillment will employees commit their energy and talent to perform in a way that increases their ability to do their work themselves.
business_objectives: Accelerate Skill Development and Learning Efficiency
Headline: Integrated learning services for transforming your salesforce, leaders, and workforce to reach peak performance.
ShortDescription: At Wilson Learning, we help organizations improve the effectiveness of their salespeople and sales leaders. Our solutions result in significant returns for our clients, including more deals won, higher margin sales, more referrals, more upsells and cross-sells to existing customers, and faster growth in sales revenue. Our customized and results-oriented approach equips sales organizations with a common language, sales methodology, sales process, strategies, skills, and techniques to help our customers achieve transformational improvements.
enhanced_description: Wilson Learning is an established provider of integrated learning services, with over 50 years of experience, dedicated to helping organizations achieve 'Performance with Fulfillment'. They specialize in assisting executive sales and leadership teams, and the broader workforce, with critical areas such as employee engagement, salesforce development, leadership development, strategy alignment, business transformation, and workforce upskilling. Their approach is disciplined and dynamic, covering assessment, development, delivery, reinforcement, and sustaining learning solutions. For sales organizations specifically, their customized and results-oriented solutions aim to improve effectiveness, leading to tangible benefits like more deals won, higher margin sales, increased referrals, more upsells and cross-sells, and accelerated sales revenue growth. They equip sales teams with a common language, sales methodology, sales process, strategies, skills, and techniques to drive transformational improvements. Key offerings include World-Class Proprietary Content, State-of-the-Industry Learning Services, and an Award-Winning Implementation Process.
